resources.string: The most inclusive cash advance app on the market.
Save hundreds of $ on BOTH bank overdraft fees & remittance fees.
*Eligibility rules apply\n\nRecipients of Social Security benefits as well as unearned incomes (alimony, child support etc.) may apply.
No tricks. No interest. No credit checks.\nNo SSN. No ITIN. No hidden or late fees.
The only cash advance app in three languages.\n(and more to come)
You\'ll be alerted on your phone when your \nbank balance is running too low.
You\'ll be able to request a cash advance to \nkeep up with bills & unexpected expenses.
Do you often send money to loved ones \noverseas? You could save hundreds of $ in \ntransfer fees (work in progress).
The phone number must contain 10 digits
The phone number must contain digits only
